title: inse and drain lentils. In a stockpot, saute onion and pinch of salt until translucent. Add garlic, carrot, pepper, chili, rosemary, oregano and bay leaves. Saute until tender. Add lentils and stock, boil, then simmer until lentils begin to disintegrate, about thirty minutes. Remove bay leaves. Puree if desired (I personally don’t desire!). Add lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste. Top with feta, rosemary and pepper before serving.
directions: In a stockpot, saute onion and pinch of salt until translucent.
Add garlic, carrot, pepper, chili, rosemary, oregano and bay leaves. Saute until tender.
Add lentils and stock, boil, then simmer until lentils begin to disintegrate, about thirty minutes.
Remove bay leaves. Puree if desired (I personally don’t desire!).
Add lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste.
Top with feta, rosemary and pepper before serving.
